jhelp.util.gui

Class JHelpGradient

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.gui.JHelpGradient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JHelpPaint

    public class JHelpGradient
extends java.lang.Object
implements JHelpPaint
    Paint of a gradient of 4 colors, each color is put on a corner of the bounding box of the shape to fill, and other pixels are there interpolation
    Author:
    JHelp
